channel.title: Nite Lite - Slippin Away [Future Bass]
channel.description: Made this in a day, hope you guys enjoy it. Definitely open to feedback! [https://soundcloud.com/nitelitemusic/slippin-away](https://soundcloud.com/nitelitemusic/slippin-away)

item.title: Nite Lite - Slippin Away [Future Bass]
item.dc:creator: Alone_in_Rome
item.description:
Crazy you say that because I originally had some in there but just before uploading it I decided to turn them off. I’ll put them back in and see if I prefer it that way and maybe I’ll reupload. And yeah I guess it is more future bassy. Thanks fam!

Read full topic

item.title: Nite Lite - Slippin Away [Future Bass]
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Not sure about tagging this as synthwave… definitely way more future bass vibe. That said though, I think it’s pretty well put together, it’s got a nice playful vibe. Would have liked to maybe hear some vocal chops, nothing too nuts just a little something. Good job!

Read full topic
